Text: Thank you so much MsFenmore for the Y&R Episodes you are very much appreciated

hello the frame rate on your videos is wrong it should be 23.976fps also the audio Hz are wrong it should not be 44100Hz it should be 48000Hz

also if you want to do hq videos encodes around 150mb try this app
